column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I've heard about Wildberry from a few friends
column2: but didn't get around to going there until a few weeks ago. Came in on a Sunday and this place was PACKED! We waited about 45 minutes for a table
column3: but it was well worth it! The pancakes were insanely good. I wish I could remember our server's name
column5: she was still extremely friendly and did a fantastic job.
